    W

    Word - Class in unipd.edids.logicBusiness.entities
    The Word class is an abstract representation of a word list that is dynamically loaded from a file and observed for changes.
    Word(String) - Constructor for class unipd.edids.logicBusiness.entities.Word
    Initializes a Word instance with the provided file path and loads words from the file.
    WordFactory - Class in unipd.edids.logicBusiness.factories
    The WordFactory class is a factory responsible for providing instances of specific word type providers such as Noun, Adjective, or Verb.
    WordFactory() - Constructor for class unipd.edids.logicBusiness.factories.WordFactory
     
    WordFactory.WordType - Enum Class in unipd.edids.logicBusiness.factories
    Represents the types of words supported within the system.
    WordFactoryTest - Class in unipd.edids.logicBusiness.factories
     
    WordFactoryTest() - Constructor for class unipd.edids.logicBusiness.factories.WordFactoryTest
     
    words - Variable in class unipd.edids.logicBusiness.entities.Word
    A protected list holding the words that are dynamically managed within the class.
    WordSelectionStrategy - Interface in unipd.edids.logicBusiness.strategies.wordSelectionStrategies
    Responsibilities: - Defines a strategy for selecting and populating words into a Sentence object
